content:
Hello @everyone just a quick note to say that the list of GSoC2025 project ideas for BRL-CAD was recently updated to include four additional projects. Give them a look over to see if any sound exciting: https://github.com/opencax/GSoC/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3A%22GSoC+2025%22+label%3A%22Project%3A+BRL-CAD%22

You can submit proposals for more than one topic -- just indicate your preference in your write-up (e.g., "this is my #1 preference").
